search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for AccuLynx (acculynx.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for AccuLynx can be found at: [https://www.acculynx.com/plans](https://www.acculynx.com/plans)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Plan Options | AccuLynx Pro vs. Elite

AccuLynx plan options

Every roofing company is unique, so we offer two different plans for roofing contractors to choose from. Our knowledgeable team will work with you to select the right plan and provide a customized price quote.

SEE DEMO
GET PRICING
What you get with the best all-in-one roofing contractor software

Each AccuLynx plan includes the tools you need to streamline your work and grow your roofing business, plus:

No contracts

Our monthly subscription option gives you flexibility so you’re not locked in.

Training anytime

Access training whenever your team needs it as long as you’re a customer.

Fast implementation

You’ll be guided through the setup process and onboarded quickly.

Live help

Call and speak to a live person whenever you have questions.

AccuLynx Pro and Elite plan features

See what roofing software features each plan has to offer.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT	PRO	ELITE
Automations manager		
Custom email templates		
Custom reporting		
Custom workflow manager		
Job milestone tracker		
Lead API		
Live activity feed		
Multiple company location set-up		
Personal or role-based dashboards		
Template manager		
User permission & location settings		
SALES & PRODUCTION	PRO	ELITE
Aerial measurement ordering		
AI-based automatic lead scoring		
Custom materials library		
Embedded web forms		
Estimates and contracts		
Invoicing		
Labor management and work orders		
Leads/CRM		
Mortgage check tracking		
Permits tracking		
Production calendar		
Production status and trade reports		
Prospecting reports		
Sales pipeline and closing percentage reports		
Supplement tracking		
Supplier direct ordering		
COMMUNICATION & COLLABORATION	PRO	ELITE
Job messaging & communications history		
Mobile field app		
Notes, tasks, reminders, and notifications		
Photo/video management & storage		
Shared appointment calendar		
Task manager		
Unlimited document storage and sharing		
FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT	PRO	ELITE
Advances and paybacks tracking		
Commissions		
Job costs and A/R tracking		
Job profit forecasting		
Marketing expense tracking		
Profit & loss analysis		
Additional tools to enrich your plan

AccuPay

Customer Portal

Smart(er) Docs

AccuFi

ReportsPlus

Texting

Mobile Crew App

AccuLynx is the leading, all-in-one roofing software designed to streamline every aspect of a roofing business. Since 2008, thousands of roofing companies have turned to our award-winning software to save time, simplify production, and sell more profitable jobs.

© 2025 ExactLogix, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Terms of Use
Privacy Policy
Copyright Policy

Explore AccuLynx software plan options for your roofing business: Compare AccuLynx Pro vs. AccuLynx Elite features here.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is customized based on the roofing company's needs and requires contacting sales for a quote.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Includes essential features for business management, sales, production, communication, and financial management.
features: Sales pipeline and closing percentage reports

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Includes all features of Pro plus additional advanced tools.
features: Additional tools to enrich your plan such as AccuPay, Customer Portal, Smart(er) Docs, AccuFi, ReportsPlus, Texting, Mobile Crew App, AppConnections

promotional_offers.offer_description: Earn up to $2,000 when you place orders to ABC Supply through AccuLynx.
